content: Been a member for years and I have truly enjoyed the app on phone, tablet, laptop, and TV!! I love the way the app has hidden gems for the individual of the person's profile. Over time and with the things you watch it picks out movies / tv shows that are similar to the program. Not to mention the HOLIDAYS!! WHOOP WHOOOP!! GENUINELY love throughout the year as the seasons change Netflix does as well . It's like Netflix could sense a winter day with a perfect movie fit just for you or family !

Now I love the app not just because it has a variety of stuff to watch but also I thought it has a beautiful user interface. Different and adaptable for use in phones/tabs/TVs until recently I experienced that it doesn't give me an option to watch credits. It automatically starts trailer (after 5 secs of course) for a different movie/web series/documentary depending on what we've watched; which is good, but there should be an option to let me watch the credits if I want to. Sad!

App wouldn't work properly. I re-installed it and it still didn't work. I restarted my phone, now the app opens, but I cannot set alarms for upcoming shows, nor can I add anything to my list. Not to mention the quite poor selection of shows Netflix has to offer. I wish there was an option to get access to more shows by paying a bit more. I'd definitely go with that.

With the latest update, using a landscape tablet has been made a nightmare with the new UI. It has been made so, unlike the promo pictures(how it used to be), program information is displayed always in a portrait manner regardless of device orientation. It also does not scale well with device screen size. I have also been having a recurring issue (not solved by any updates) where audio plays and screen is black. The content is pretty good, however a lot of shows are cancelled after 1 series

The schreen is always too dark. I can barely see. Netflix app should not be allowed to adjust the brightness of the video. And the subtitles are very bright, when I do need it in night mode. I have to always turn yhem off. We should be able to dim the brightness of the subtitles and have full control of the brightness of the screen.

Unfortunately i am forever having to force close the app, alot of the time again and again, constantly getting the same error codes that don't allow me to watch anything, and now it has taken to playing but the screen is black, tho I am able to watch it in a minimised thumbnail. Great. Well worth the 12.99 I pay for it, NOT. F#?*ers.

Have had Netflix since it started and never had problems. Now I can not open the app on my tablet due to needing to update. It's has been trying to update for a weeks and still wont updated and not working, just spinning. Very disappointed with customers service on getting resolved. Netflix used to have really good customers service. Not sure what happen.

Wonderful selection of top movies and shows. Algorithm to determine my taste exceeded the normal flow of follow up feature films being worthwhile viewing. I also like the trailers being shown while looking at just the titles.... impressive attention to the viewers comfort and ease of use. This flow of interaction between human and cyber interface is commendable! Thank you for approaching your platform from the user end and not the mass profir and production aspect.

Good overall, sometimes annoying with chromecasting. Worst offense is in a recent update where the casting button was moved. It only displays when I scroll all the way to the top. And instead of being in an easy to reach position (bottom right ish) it is now all the way at the top. I do not see any benefit to the new casting button and I'm constantly annoyed at it. I have to scroll down to pick a show, but then back up when I can't start casting because of this new button location.

Love Netflix, we don't get tv reception where we live so we rely on Netflix. One thing I would like to see is more new content, although there is always something to watch, I think Netflix should add a feature where any movie you have watched won't show up unless you go to " already watched" I'm browsing through the same stuff every month, it's a bit annoying, but thank you for your service.

Allows access to a service that has a fair selection of entertainments. Original and otherwise, the entertainments are about as good as TV. Can no longer be used in landscape mode because of a recent update that uses data (for no good reason) to give a fullscreen preview of the thing you wish to watch. The preview currently doesn't slide up out of the way when scrolling through episodes (which I used to do.) Aside from that, it's a great app that allows access to a pretty good streaming service.

I love netflix but ever since the last update my phone freaks out everytime I try to do picture In picture. The only way I can describe the freakout is that I can still hear/ see the show if I hold my phone portrait style, but landscape style the mini window disappears but the sound remains and my whole screen looks like it is vibrating trying to rapidly switch from landscape to portrait but only the edges of the screen. Any help with this would be great.

Personally i do like Netflix. I enjoy the movies and shows and on pc and tv it works just fine. However, if i want to watch on my phone (Samsung) all i get is a black screen. The audio works just fine, so do all the setting buttons. But there's no video. I tried reinstalling. Opening/closing. But it still only shows a black screen on my phone. Please fix it!

I have just one complaint could you plz add an option to manually lock the video quality, cause my internet speed fluctuates (i think) which causes the video quality to auto set to like 360p and its soo hard to get the quality back up (close the app,go forwards/backwards at times it still doesn't work) which sucks. I can stream videos on other platforms like youtube at 1080p with no problems but the auto here messes it all up!....... Decrease in internet speed? BAM! Enjoy Potato Quality Buddy :)

Good app. But (1) Free trial unavailable. (2) Rate system is 👍or👎. This is very narrow. 5 star rating would have been apt. (3) It'll be helpful if tappable buttons are provided to move rows (viz. my list, continue watching, etc.) left or right. (4) It'll be helpful if a setting is provided to keep the device navigation bar and/or status bar visible when video is playing.

I've been using netflix for a long time and it was great but i've been experiencing some issues these few days. Its not loading properly, i have to close and open the app again for atleast 10 times for it to work again. After playing one episode the next one doesnt load. It just doesnt load for me. Tried restarting my phone doesnt work. Tried on another phone doesnt work. Its really hard to watch anything now. Please fix the issue

It's kind of expensive now that the price went up. There should be the option of country selection. It bothers me that there are no trailers, so I have to go on YouTube to see what a movie is about. There's a lack of old movies and you mostly get new rubbish. It bothers me that they keep proposing me TV series, when I clearly never watch any. It's also annoying that they propose me movies not in English; description is nice, I get all fired up and then the movie is in Portuguese or Korean only.

In general, I like the Netflix service, and it works well. My problems with the app are: 1) The constant change of category order in the in the app is annoying. 2) I can't find a setting to disable autoplay of trailers in the notification section. 3) I know I have seen all of some series, but I can't see this in the app anymore. 4) I hate that I can't turn off binge watching. A note to Netflix in general, I hate that you call it a season, but there are only 6-12 episodes released per year.

*THE RATING I GAVE APPLIES TO MY PERSONAL EXPERIENCE DUE TO MY BROAD INTERESTS* It's great but oftentimes the library feels kind of small, especially regarding movies. A great selection for kids [I guess, I don't know what's popular anymore] but if you have specific tastes (i.e. sci-fi only or non-cheesy horror) you may require an additional service such as Hulu or HBOmax. There is good stuff here, just not enough...

I enjoy using this app. But may I suggest that you put something like verification or confirmation on the settings tab, because I have experienced that someone had changed my plan, I was shocked when I see my account billing which I did not do. Maybe it was my child who accidentally click on the account setting and changed it or maybe one of the people who's using my password. It would be great if you could verify first any changes that will happen on the account. Thank you.

I love the app but recently it's not working. Every time i open it shows there is some problem with the netflix service and i should try again later. But it has been days and that hasn't changed. I even uninstalled and reinstalled the app but it worked only for a few hours and has again stopped working.

Netflix will always feel warm to most of us. As soon as you see and hear that famous N and sound, you know you're about to get into something good. 3 issues: 1) you can't always turn brightness down all the way on the phone. You have to move the bar up then down again a few times. 2) loved the audio only mode as you can't get all things on Audible, so it was nice to put something on for the kids at bedtime or listening to a comedy/documentary whilst driving.

Lately i havent been able to watch anything on netflix, the episode or movie will play for about two seconds and then it'll freeze and not play again. When you leave the episode and try to replay it, the screen goes completely black and only the audio can be heard.I dont think its my phone because my wifi and service are at full bars so i dont know the problem.

I like Netflix but theres this glitch that's happening on my samsung phone, in which when I first open the app and click a show, the screen plays for half a second and then freezes while the audio still plays. PLEASE FIX THIS ITS SO ANNOYING Edit: updated the app, now my screen goes black when I try to watch it. Audio but no screen. Lowered rating from 3 stars to 1

Once t*lk*ms*l network issue solved, here comes the "Sorry we couldn't reach the Netflix service. Please try again later. (-1001)". It's unsolved by live chat, so I follow steps from y**t*b* & it works. But still left other issue: Couldn't share to ig story. The live chat only mention it's not allowed to share --> well, then what's the point of Netflix's share button?? Dear Developer, is it bug? Kindly repair the apps --and your CS' product & troubleshooting knowledge, thanks!

I used to have no issues with Netflix here on my phone because I was able to watch and download videos properly but it has been 3 days since my Netflix won't open. I tried restarting my device and it will work but after not using it for a long period of time, it won't open again, also it won't allow me to download anymore like it would show its downloading but won't actually download, on the other hand, my laptop sometimes does this to, hope you fix it soon

Best app so far, and thank you for the low cost mobile plan. Unfortunately still i feel it's expensive. We are from third world countries, expecting $2/month or lower with any quality. We are not so rich. My friends also like to join with you. Because of high price they don't want to do. Please consider lowering price specially for third world countries, you will get unbelievable results and many loyalty customers. We have so much love, not a million of USD.

I would give more stars, however for the month i have not been able to check any upcoming shows or movies to remind when when it comes out. I have even notified Netflix through chat and told them the problem and I was told that they would fix the problem ASAP. Well that was over 2 weeks ago. This is very frustrating. I have done all of the updates, even uninstalled and reinstalled and that has not fixed the problem. Please fix the problem, and i'll fix my rating.

I love Netflix when I am subscribed to the app. Unfortunately I am not at this current time. I have it downloaded however. There's just a lot of cheaper ways to watch most of my other favorite T.V. Shows & movies without a monthly bill. But Netflix does have it's own great selection of shows that my Hubby and I miss. Their Customer Service Employees are wonderful. They are probably one of the easiest I've ever worked with. Just the price isn't for me.

My favorite app. Board? Sitting in a waiting room? Watch a movie!!! Quickly loads all content. Nice to download a few movies to watch on long flights while in airplane mode. Only issue I have that I had to uninstall and reinstall is that once I had hit play on a movie, the screen went black but I could hear the audio. This has happened quite a few times. This is the only reason I gave 4 stars which I hated to do.

The app often crash lately. Now, in the main page, it won't load. I can't watch anything. I've force stop the app, nothing happen. Seriously, if this continue to happen in the next month, Imma change platform. FR Edit: fixed. I had to restart my phone. But, seriously. I'm gonna change platform if this continue to happen.

For some reason the app is making my whole phone restart, has happened a couple of times now, usually whilst I'm trying to exit the app or changing series. Also why does it need to change the phone brightness? And I can't disable that feature? Just very unnecessary things are happening with the app. Viewing episodes on its own is good yeah but with all these stupid bugs/features is not good.

Please fix this new feature I guess it is where we can not go to each season that we want to start on. We only have the option of starting all over or starting on the last season. I sometimes like to go back and watch any episode now I can not. That is very annoying so please fix asap or just put it back. For the prices we pay we should be able to watch whatever episode we want!!!!

Netflix is the Best platform to see movies and Series.. But I think whenever I play any movies it's get blur in between which low the mood of watching movie..... Netflix should directly give option like EG : 144p, 240p, 360p, 720p, 1080p. I would like to see this options , which will make viewer more stable and to choose their option to watch.

Please put the 'My list' option +/- to the pop up of a series/movie in the android app. Or at least when you go back to browsing, go back to where you left off. So annoying to have to go to the details of a series to tick it into my list, and when I return I have to scroll through the whole list again. Otherwise this app is super!

This aap is very good for those who loves watching movies, not only movies but also anime shows and series. There are too much choices for the audience to see what the wants. There are also a specific movies and shows that are only visible on this Netflix. After all this app is best for both pc, mobile and even Android TV.

Double charge and continue to charge me even after cancelation. Recently noticed that I was charged even though the account was canceled back in December of 2020. Looking further back in my bank transaction, I also noticed that I was being double charged every month since February of 2020. They will not refund me for the year of double charging, All they refunded me was for the month of March. Talking about robbing people.

Netflix is not running hd on my Samsung m51. My Netflix plan is ULTRA HD this month and it was for the whole time. I go to App Settings>playback settings I see widevine l3 and playback resolution is SD. I even turned High data usage on Account > playback settings, still it's not HD. But the phone is actually is widevine l1 so it should support HD , but why is it not playing HD?

The app has been giving an error message for the past week. I have uninstalled and installed it, same error. I have also tried logging into the website from my phone (Pixel2) and I receive an error there as well. I've been a Netflix customer since 2004, before streaming existed, and this is very frustrating. Fix it and communicate with your customer base that it's occurring and what you're doing to resolve it please. You should be crediting the additional fee upcharge for multiple device stream

This app is absolutely amazing its structured for easy access and browsing through all your favorite shows ,movies, programs, and much more!! I love the features of pausing and starting again specially when you just ordered food to eat and watch with the 5 star Program or Movie!! Great choices to choose from and you can get early releases and new Netflix Movies Genres only here you will be addicted!! 5 stars . The Best is yet to come remember all those TV shows we grew on who 's the Boss others

I Had a bad experience with this app because it starts by itself in the background and slows down your phone and also the same thing happens on the Netflix app for Windows. I discourage users to install this app because it will run in the background and it will slow down your system and use your connection while you don't want it to. It's all part of Netflix disreputable private policy.

! Why do you an expire date, for the movie / tv shows. to come off list? ! Searching for a movie / TV show. You database recognised item, before completing sentence. And when you select it, it's not there? ! Consolidate the movie sequels into one area, not scattered across. ! Your movie sequels is incomplete. Example: there's a Part 3, but where's Part 1 & 2? ! Put a better search filters.

Great app, I love It, sensational in fact but... they need to fix some major bugs and issues which are affecting the app a lot. These include the not loading the app properly and taking many tries to get it to work, the one I've experienced more which is were half the movies don't load on my phone but they do on the smart tv or my pc and the last one is about listening, I bet they have lost hundreds of thousands of people due to them not listening or helping out with a common problems. Pls fix!

Was working well for a day or two, but suddenly it keeps freezing. The audio will play but the video is frozen after only 5 mins of playing. I tried different videos and backing out and coming back in. Even tried to uninstall and reinstall twice. I love Netflix and have used it back before it was mostly a streaming site, so I am disappointed in the app. It would be nice to watch a video without having to go back out and back in every 5 seconds.

Plays well even on poorer connections. Where's the timer button gone though? The app no longer has an automatic 'time-out' after a period of no activity. You could then manually manage it with the timer function (e.g. let it play for 45mins), but it seems the last update removed this function. Can we get this back please? I don't want my phone to run all night of I fall asleep watching stuff 🤣😴

Too many bugs for a paid service. Releases are pushed without tests. Recently a huge battery drain with a chromecast use. And the new iOS inspired navigation with the chromecast menu on top and then the selection down is against all UI guidelines. You don't make the user navigate up to down just to select a box. For 10k users, it's a very good app, for 100M, it's a joke.

I have never been more amazed of something else. But the original contents should be more on point rather than focusing on just an specific matter. The irish man, the undercover are something which trully amazed me. And some good series lost its renewal due to losing plot. When do we get to see something like supernatural, friends, breaking bad and more like this. So I am looking for more like this.

The UI on mobile is good. The web based UI sucks. I'm just trying to scroll down and every damn selection balloons up and fuchs everything up. I don't need auto expanding previews. Concerning content netflix is lacking. There have been some amazing series and originals, but IMO (this means opinion, not fact) there is too much sex and homosexuality. Not that it's there, it's just so blatant and over the top. Representation matters, but netflix's blitzkrieg on inclusion is a bit tactless.

Love netflix in general but this app has just started to have a major flaw. All of a sudden, my screen is ridiculously dark, I'm trying to watch The Ranch and there are some scenes that I literally can not see unless I am in a pitch black room. Obviously I've tried all the fixes so don't come at me thinking I just wrote a review without looking for solutions. Brightness setting is all the way up for both app and phone. All the other fixes literally do nothing. On a Galaxy S20 Ultra

Data usage setting in app doesn't work. I love Netflix, but I have the setting in the app for using mobile data set to "off" but it still uses the data. Becomes a costly app if you use it and forget to turn off your mobile data! (My WiFi has a habit of turning off and me not noticing and it switches to mobile data even though I purposely say not to). Please fix!

I have used the app with a mi a1 and a poco x3, both have 1080p screens, both reach a speed of 28 mbps, and I have the premium plan that supports up to 4k, but the maximum playback resolution I get is sd. Also the x3 supports hdr but the hdr capabilities are "none". Doesn't worth the price if you can watch content only in SD.

Surprised I didn't write a review earlier. I've had this since 2016 and it is arguably better than any other streaming app, and even as shows and movies are being taken away from it, it still has a greater variety than any other streaming service. Must have. Edit: Doesn't have a good collection of anime, Hulu does and stays up to date.

Can't change video size to fit to screen, letterbox viewing only, can't properly search for things to watch, only the rubbish lists of trending now, continue watching etc (it was pants that's why we didn't watch it all). Wouldn't mind paying if there was actually a complete list of original content that can't be found elsewhere for free or hasn't already been on TV. Every app update the layout gets worse. The content is mainly badly subbed, subtitles only or repeats from other tv companies.

Love Netflix! I just wish they would get it figured out so I can "listen" to shows/movies on my phone while I'm doing other things. Sometimes I don't want the little rectangle video playing..... I'm using a Samsung S20+. I know you can do this on an iphone.... come on guys - let's get this figured out! 😁

Very bad compatibility wise, it only works on devices 2-4 generations down, after that you have little to no hope of having any bugs patched. Black screen on my phone, infinite title screen that just says netflix on my tablet, and weekly updates that dont add new features or fix bugs. However when everything works it is a extremely high quality experience, however it lacks more detailed playback settings. If anything where to be added, I would recommend a simplified menu for low end devices.

Used to love this app until I discovered Hulu. I keep it around for a few Netflix originals I like. Customer service is a joke, I "chatted" with someon named "Barbie Girl" super professional by the way. Well Barbie didnt know anything, so I'm on my own to figure out why my non restricted profile is all of a sudden restricted even though it says there are no restrictions. Thanks Netflix.

No audio language mentioned in the description of the video like in Amazon prime. It doesn't play the video and says slow internet speed but I am able to play videos on youtube and also able to download things. My internet connection was fluctuating so that might had been the issue but now it is stable but still it is showing me this error. I tried to restart the app multiple times but it didn't help.

Brightness control is a NUISANCE... There's also no option to disable it.. When watching something and you have an important message or something else, I would do Picture in Picture mode. But due to Netflix brightness setting it makes it way too bright or too dim... Overall the app is great, LOVE that they allow you to do PIP. But they still need to update this app.

Cast and 'remote' sync with Samsung TV is horrible. I can't get it to cast properly sometimes. Sometimes, it'll successfully cast & start playing on TV but the mobile app thinks it's not casting (no controls). Sometimes it can only cast if the TV app was not initially opened on the TV. Sometimes and really rarely, it'll just work. Everything else is great except this function

third class application. even if internet is fine some movies / tv shows do not play. An error pops up saying check your internet connection or try again later. why the hell should we pay for such worst service. Unsubscribing right now. Called customer care they told login with a different profile and try. It worked once then same issue. Why should I login with another profile in the first place? Issue is with your database get it rectified first then charge money for subscription !!!

Love Netflix and the content but recently there are some issues with the app used on my phone (Android 10), error message 501-109 Device faileaure pops up every time I open the app. I need to restart phone every time after this error, works fine for couple of hours, then error goes back if I close and open again app. sometimes it makes me login all over again after restarting.also tried to uninstall and install again the app. This is becoming really tiresome

it just refuses to open. i've tried uninstalling but it doesn't even let me do that and it keeps leading me to update the app but even after updating it like 15 times it still doesn't open. it keeps showing the error message. i've seen around 3 to 4 other recent reviews that have said the same thing. please work on this. edit: it started working right after I posted this review but the same thing is happening now again. please find a long term solution.

I love it, but does anyone has the series problem? Like when you go into like f.r.i.e.n.d.s you can see what season you're watching but now it clearly a blank space and didnt show anything... netflix i am hoping that you can fix this problem as soon as possible so that i can know what season or series im watching

I never get bored when I've got Netflix on my phone! Can download movies & TV shows then watch them while I'm on public transport or on holiday, and it doesn't use up any data! Excellent range of shows & movies, still by far the best TV subscription app.

A lot of kids shows are ordered backwards (ex. Croods starts at season 4) and it annoys myself and my kids. For example, in Trolls there are new characters introduced throughout each season, and plot points that don't make sense without seeing the older seasons. Until there is at least an option to change this, my review will remain 1* on any review site I can find.

Wonderful app. Would be 5 stars if not for the bugs. Your smart downloads don't update if you watch the show on your pc or smart tv AND if you pause a show, then lock your phone, it starts playing upon unlock. Tried to call my boss at work and my phone started screaming. Felt like that college kids who opens his laptop and inappropriate vids start playing.

Netflix was working just fine until about a month ago when it dims my screen automatically. It's insanely frustrating how it overrides my settings and shows videos in the lowest bright setting despite my phone being at 100% brightness. I'm seeing that I'm not the only one. Until this issue is fixed, I won't be rating this app more than a 1 star.

Great content, so far the best streaming service to watch and easy to navigate in-app and website. Would have given it 5 stars but my only problem is, it needs to let us know when a movie or series is about to expire or be removed because you will miss your chance to watch it. Please add a function to let users know when a content is about to be removed.

Movies are just repeats, never any good new ones. It is basically a channel now with it's own shows. Bleh. Don't get too interested in a series because they will pull it off b4 you finish it. Happened to me multiple times.... like it knew I was nearing the end. I only keep it for my kids.

It buffers a lot ,even though my internet connection is good on my mobile. This is the worst app considering the price they take. I have used other ott application like prime ,hotstar never faced such an issue not even once. Gives me an error msg telling your internet speed is low but that's not the case I have a good internet connection.

This app is getting ridiculous to use... It keeps crashing when I open it, sometimes it won't connect to my chromecast, and when I actually get it to work, the "notification" contols keep dissapearing. I could maybe understand if I had some obscure phone, but this is on Samsung S10e. Please fix this app ASAP, because it's almost useles now.

Really love the app, however I have deleted all my downloaded items to download new content. Now when I try to download content(on wifi), I get a pop up notification stating that I need to make space before downloading can commence? Either than that, it's a great app!

I love this app. Hiwever they could do better with their selection of anime and they could better keep up with updates to shows instead of waiting almost a year after a show goes off the air to release the 1st 10 episodes of a show with ovet 100 episodes. Also id just like to pint out that on one punch man the preview is english dubbed but all the episodes in the show are japanese only. Serioualy guys. What the hell is the point???

It requires you to have a legible credit card or any postpaid number for the billing even though you will just use it for free, which turns out to be inconvenient because not all people have credit card and postpaid sim card, if the payment method is not settled then the 1 month free trial is useless if you dont have those two things (In My Opinion)

Can not see Audio Languages option when scrolling/browsing Straight away. Hard to find it without playing first. Too many things to browse through. Too many things being churned out to throw all at you and hoping few will stick. Recommendations is okayish. I like great documentaries but they mostly USA focused. Only Like and dislike button, there is no way to type feedback/reviews.

My Netflix hasn't been working for over 3 months which is really frustrating as I am a paying customer.whenever I try to watch the screen is completely black and its only not working on my phone .I've uninstalled and reinstalled it multiple times and it still doesn't work very upset about this.

Loved it at first its only since the price has went up the stuff has got worse all the films from long ago or different languages never anything new or exciting all the same stuff gets took off and put back on I'm fed up paying for this if it wasn't for my son watching a film at bedtime and now and then during the day it would have been cancelled the first time the price went up and he's struggling to find new things to watch he's only 10 I sure yous can sort something this simple please thanx

It was nice to see netflix but now I am not able to even download it on my phone. It was working nice and smooth but one day I deleted netflix and now I am not able to download it. I tried restarting my phone, I even rebooted my phone but still not able to download it. It always stops downloading at 83%. Please do something.

This app is built well on top of that. It uses less data then every other service while sending the same quailty of content. Disney+ , prime, hulu, vrv, crunchy, youtubetv, vuduu, plex, and the whole slew of others. Netflix may have been the small dog but they built somthing great here. Yes this is a fact. This is the random things you figure out working at an isp troublshooting the other services that are brittle af from an engineer stand point.

I love Netflix but lots of their shows straight up suck. They always get rid of some really good shows then but in bad ones. Also I can also download certain shows and movies which is BS knowing that you're paying them monthly. I have no idea what even happened to Netflix they used to have great content and a great service as well. Unless you like watching trash shows then idk what else to tell you except they need a fixer upper.

I already signed up and made an account, however, im having a hard time in purchasing the plan since it keeps telling me that there are problems occuring eventhough my connection is good, I wanted to purchase the premium one in my mobile phone via topups method but why the hell does it not work? Please fix that.

Mobile Netflix freezes every single time I want to watch something. Happens consistently. Watch for 2 minutes, screen freezes while audio still plays. Only fix is to restart phone which means I have to restart my device every single time I want to watch Netflix. Not ergonomic at all. Peeves me off that I can't watch anything without this problem.. Not a single update has fixed this yet.

Brightness is set to max but video is incredibly dark. There is no contrast. If the scene in the video is dark, I can't see any details. But if, and only if, I take a screenshot or go to picture-in-picture, then the image is fine

Has an issue on my S21 where it gives an error when I try to download shows. Works one time, then next day says I have downloads on too many devices, which I do not. Talked to support many times, who seem to run out of ideas and then blame me somehow, over and over and over...

It's pretty good, quality wise. But wait for it. Since I love anime, I was excited to see how this would work. Ive seen people all over the globe talking about Netflix and the great anime *movies* they had. Not many anime series. But I decide to see if they have My Hero Academia Movies. Nothing. But then... One day I go into Netflix and all the best are there. AoT, MHA, BNA, etc. The next day they're all gone. Everything. Just the originals. Flash in the pan. I hope to see more anime here soon.

If you look at a film or tv show, Netflix, with magnificent foresight will recommend it as specially selected for you.
